message.content: {"id": "14197", "title": "Removing a working set immediately makes changes", "description": "When deleting a working set, the package view in the background immediately gets refiltered. I believe the refiltering should only happen when the working set selection dialog is closed, not during manipulation. Additionally, I suggest that pressing cancel should undo all changes made to the working sets, including canceling the remove operation.", "OB": "1. Create a working set with one project and select it. The package view should be filtered accordingly.\n2. Open the working set dialog again, create a second working set, and delete the first working set.", "EB": "", "SR": "200204181. Create a working set with one project and select it. Observe that the package view is filtered.\n2. Open the working set dialog again, create a second working set, and delete the first working set. Observe that the package view is immediately refiltered and that canceling the remove operation does not undo the changes made to the working sets."}

origin.input_content:
